info.author: Fanstatic Developers
info.description:
js.jquery_metadata
******************

Introduction
============

This library packages `jQuery Metadata`_ for `fanstatic`_.

.. _`fanstatic`: http://fanstatic.org
.. _`jQuery Metadata`: http://plugins.jquery.com/project/metadata

This requires integration between your web framework and ``fanstatic``,
and making sure that the original resources (shipped in the ``resources``
directory in ``js.jquery_metadata``) are published to some URL.


How to use?
===========


You can import ``metadata`` from ``js.jquery_metadata`` and ``need`` it where you want
these resources to be included on a page::

  >>> from js.jquery_metadata import metadata
  >>> metadata.need()


CHANGES
*******

2.1 (2011-01-11)
================

- Initial release.
